com.upsight.android.persistence

Interface UpsightDataStore


  • public interface UpsightDataStore
    Implements a data store which can dynamically turn persisted data into analytics metrics. Developers can use this data store for the persistence of the application data and after deployment configure the SDK to turn persistent data into analytics metrics.
    This class implements typical data store with enhancements such as supporting subscriptions to the creation, update and/or removal of entries within the data store. This allows parts of your application to be aware of the data changes while maintaining loose coupling.
    See Also:
    Created, Updated, Removed

    • Method Detail

      • fetch

        <T> UpsightSubscription fetch(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                              java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ids,
                              UpsightDataStoreListener<java.util.Set<T>> listener)
        Fetches the stored object(s) of type T corresponding to the set of provided IDs.
        If any of the identifiers do not correspond to an object in the data store the operation will fail and the listener will be called.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type T of the objects to be fetched.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the Class of type T.
        ids - the set of unique object identifiers.
        listener - the listener to call back with the results of the operation.
        Returns:
        a cancellable subscription that binds the listener to the call.

      • remove

        <T> UpsightSubscription remove(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                               java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ids,
                               UpsightDataStoreListener<java.util.Set<T>> listener)
        Removes the stored object(s) of type T corresponding to the set of provided IDs.
        If any of the identifiers do not correspond to an object in the data store the operation will fail and the listener UpsightDataStoreListener.onFailure(com.upsight.android.UpsightException) will be called.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type T of the objects to be fetched.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the Class of type T.
        ids - the set of unique object identifiers.
        listener - the listener to call back with the results of the operation.
        Returns:
        a cancellable subscription that binds the listener to the call.
